akn:section.akn:heading: Attorney General to advise heads of executive departments

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 512. Attorney General to advise heads of executive departments The head of an executive department may require the opinion of the Attorney General on questions of law arising in the administration of his department. (Added Pub. L. 89–554, § 4(c), Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 613.)
